result.execSummary:
The defendant David T Grooms was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse Assessments], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Partial payment plan:  $50.00 per month.  3 day(s) RCJ for contempt for failure to pay.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. David T Grooms

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant David T Grooms in court.  Robin K. Green appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter: Elizabeth Kiel.   CCV complete.  State was going to amend to ord DC but there is a positive ZCI & BJ in Waukesha Co.  State rec:  50+cc & will not issue BJ charges.
COP & RTAW filed.
P - NC
BTC:  Guilty 
CC
PPP $50/mo begin 6-1-15
FTP:  3 days
Plea/sentencing hearing on March 30, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant David T Grooms in court.  Robin K. Green appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter: Maggie Techert.  
BTC:  CCV  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for March 30, 2015 at 08:30 am.
copy of letter from State Public Defender - not eligible
Status conference on March 9, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Pre-trial conference on February 12, 2015 at 03:15 pm.

Charges per attached criminal complaint. Conditions:  It is a condition of this bond that the defendant NOT consume or possess any  alcohol.  This is to be monitored by random UA's and/or breathalyzers.  The defendant is to report to Zimmerman Consulting Inc. (ZCI) for monitoring - report to 524 Main Street, Suite 302, Racine, WI  53403 (third floor of the Monument Square Building) or call (262)632-1780 to immediately schedule an appointment.  The defendant is further ordered to report for testing after each court appearance.  No violent contact with the victim (person, property, residence or family).   Make all court appearances on time.  Failure to appear will result in the issuance of a warrant for your arrest, possible bail jumping charges and forfeiture of any bond on deposit.

Defendant David T Grooms in court with attorney Mindy M. Nolan.  Defendant David T Grooms in custody.  Matthew J. Hastings appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter: Pat Phinisee.  Reading of complaint is waived, probable cause found, p-ng, bond set.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for February 12, 2015 at 03:15 pm.  Status conference scheduled for March 9, 2015 at 08:30 am.
